subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius, a double-amputee sprinter, finished second before a cheering crowd in Olympic Stadium in Rome, trailing only Stefano Braciola, who won in 46.72 seconds.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius, a double-amputee sprinter, finished second before a cheering crowd in Olympic Stadium in Rome, trailing only Stefano Braciola, who won in 46.72 seconds.
